name: Water Bottle
description: Create a water bottle (base for all potions)
tips: Fill glass bottles from any water source or cauldron

name: Awkward Potion
description: Brew an Awkward Potion (Nether Wart + Water Bottle)
tips: Base for most useful potions. Requires Nether Wart from fortresses

name: Mundane Potion
description: Brew a Mundane Potion (various ingredients + Water Bottle)
tips: Made with redstone, glowstone, or other ingredients. Only used for Weakness

name: Thick Potion
description: Brew a Thick Potion (Glowstone Dust + Water Bottle)
tips: Has no direct uses in current versions

name: Potion of Healing
description: Brew a Potion of Healing (Glistering Melon + Awkward Potion)
tips: Instantly restores 4 hearts. Damages undead mobs

name: Potion of Healing II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of Healing II (Glowstone + Healing)
tips: Restores 8 hearts instantly. Essential for boss fights

name: Potion of Regeneration
description: Brew a Potion of Regeneration (Ghast Tear + Awkward Potion)
tips: Ghast Tears are rare drops. Restores health over 45 seconds

name: Potion of Regeneration (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Regeneration (Redstone + Regeneration)
tips: Lasts 1 minute 30 seconds instead of 45 seconds

name: Potion of Regeneration II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of Regeneration II (Glowstone + Regeneration)
tips: Faster regeneration but shorter duration (22 seconds)

name: Potion of Strength
description: Brew a Potion of Strength (Blaze Powder + Awkward Potion)
tips: Adds 3 damage (1.5 hearts) to melee attacks for 3 minutes

name: Potion of Strength (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Strength (Redstone + Strength)
tips: Lasts 8 minutes instead of 3 minutes

name: Potion of Strength II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of Strength II (Glowstone + Strength)
tips: Adds 6 damage (3 hearts) but only lasts 1:30

name: Potion of Swiftness
description: Brew a Potion of Swiftness (Sugar + Awkward Potion)
tips: Increases speed by 20% and FOV. Great for exploration

name: Potion of Swiftness (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Swiftness (Redstone + Swiftness)
tips: Lasts 8 minutes instead of 3 minutes

name: Potion of Swiftness II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of Swiftness II (Glowstone + Swiftness)
tips: 40% speed boost but only lasts 1:30

name: Potion of Fire Resistance
description: Brew a Potion of Fire Resistance (Magma Cream + Awkward Potion)
tips: Essential for Nether exploration and blaze fighting

name: Potion of Fire Resistance (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Fire Resistance (Redstone + Fire Resistance)
tips: Lasts 8 minutes - perfect for long Nether expeditions

name: Potion of Water Breathing
description: Brew a Potion of Water Breathing (Pufferfish + Awkward Potion)
tips: Required for ocean monument raids. Pufferfish from fishing or ocean

name: Potion of Water Breathing (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Water Breathing (Redstone + Water Breathing)
tips: Lasts 8 minutes - enough for most underwater tasks

name: Potion of Night Vision
description: Brew a Potion of Night Vision (Golden Carrot + Awkward Potion)
tips: See in darkness and underwater. Golden carrots from villagers or crafting

name: Potion of Night Vision (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Night Vision (Redstone + Night Vision)
tips: Lasts 8 minutes - great for cave exploration

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: Brew a Potion of Invisibility (Fermented Spider Eye + Night Vision)
tips: Remove armor for full invisibility. Mobs detect at shorter range

name: Potion of Invisibility (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Invisibility (Redstone + Invisibility)
tips: Lasts 8 minutes for extended stealth operations

name: Potion of Slow Falling
description: Brew a Potion of Slow Falling (Phantom Membrane + Awkward Potion)
tips: Essential for End exploration. Phantom membranes from killing phantoms

name: Potion of Slow Falling (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Slow Falling (Redstone + Slow Falling)
tips: Lasts 4 minutes - great for exploring End islands

name: Potion of Leaping
description: Brew a Potion of Leaping (Rabbit's Foot + Awkward Potion)
tips: Rabbit's Foot is a rare drop. Increases jump height by 0.5 blocks

name: Potion of Leaping (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Leaping (Redstone + Leaping)
tips: Lasts 8 minutes instead of 3 minutes

name: Potion of Leaping II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of Leaping II (Glowstone + Leaping)
tips: Jump 1.25 blocks higher but only lasts 1:30

name: Potion of Poison
description: Brew a Potion of Poison (Spider Eye + Awkward Potion)
tips: Deals damage over time but cannot kill. Use as splash on enemies

name: Potion of Poison (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Poison (Redstone + Poison)
tips: Lasts 1:30 instead of 45 seconds

name: Potion of Poison II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of Poison II (Glowstone + Poison)
tips: Faster damage but only lasts 21 seconds

name: Potion of Harming
description: Brew a Potion of Harming (Fermented Spider Eye + Healing/Poison)
tips: Deals 6 damage instantly. Heals undead mobs

name: Potion of Harming II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of Harming II (Glowstone + Harming)
tips: Deals 12 damage (6 hearts) instantly

name: Potion of Weakness
description: Brew a Potion of Weakness (Fermented Spider Eye + Water Bottle)
tips: Required to cure zombie villagers with golden apple

name: Potion of Weakness (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Weakness (Redstone + Weakness)
tips: Lasts 4 minutes instead of 1:30

name: Potion of Slowness
description: Brew a Potion of Slowness (Fermented Spider Eye + Swiftness/Leaping)
tips: Reduces movement speed by 15%. Useful as splash on enemies

name: Potion of Slowness (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of Slowness (Redstone + Slowness)
tips: Lasts 4 minutes instead of 1:30

name: Potion of Slowness IV
description: Brew a Potion of Slowness IV (Glowstone + Slowness)
tips: Reduces speed by 60% but only lasts 20 seconds

name: Potion of the Turtle Master
description: Brew a Potion of the Turtle Master (Turtle Shell + Awkward Potion)
tips: Gives Slowness IV and Resistance III. Turtle shells from baby turtles

name: Potion of the Turtle Master (Extended)
description: Brew an extended Potion of the Turtle Master (Redstone + Turtle Master)
tips: Lasts 40 seconds instead of 20 seconds

name: Potion of the Turtle Master II
description: Brew an enhanced Potion of the Turtle Master II (Glowstone + Turtle Master)
tips: Slowness VI and Resistance IV - nearly invincible but immobile

name: Splash Potion of Healing
description: Brew a Splash Potion of Healing (Gunpowder + Healing Potion)
tips: Can heal allies and damage undead at range

name: Splash Potion of Harming
description: Brew a Splash Potion of Harming (Gunpowder + Harming Potion)
tips: Excellent for combat - throw at enemy groups

name: Splash Potion of Weakness
description: Brew a Splash Potion of Weakness (Gunpowder + Weakness Potion)
tips: Required splash form for curing zombie villagers

name: Lingering Potion of Healing
description: Brew a Lingering Potion of Healing (Dragon's Breath + Splash Healing)
tips: Creates healing cloud. Dragon's Breath from Ender Dragon

name: Lingering Potion of Harming
description: Brew a Lingering Potion of Harming (Dragon's Breath + Splash Harming)
tips: Creates damage cloud - used for tipped arrows

name: Arrow of Healing
description: Craft Arrows of Healing (8 Arrows + Lingering Healing)
tips: Heal allies from a distance in combat

name: Arrow of Harming
description: Craft Arrows of Harming (8 Arrows + Lingering Harming)
tips: Powerful ranged damage option

name: Ominous Bottle
description: Obtain an Ominous Bottle from a trial chamber
tips: Gives Bad Omen effect for trial chambers. Found in trial chamber loot

name: Infested Effect
description: Experience the Infested status effect
tips: 1.21 effect - spawns silverfish when taking damage. From Ominous Trials

name: Oozing Effect
description: Experience the Oozing status effect
tips: 1.21 effect - spawns slimes on death. From Ominous Trials

name: Weaving Effect
description: Experience the Weaving status effect
tips: 1.21 effect - spawns cobwebs on death. From Ominous Trials

name: Wind Charged Effect
description: Experience the Wind Charged status effect
tips: 1.21 effect - creates wind burst on death. From Ominous Trials

name: All Base Potions
description: Brew all three base potions: Awkward, Mundane, and Thick
tips: Awkward is most useful, Mundane for Weakness, Thick has no use

name: Complete Brewing Setup
description: Build a complete brewing station with all ingredients organized
tips: Include Nether Wart farm, Blaze Powder supply, and ingredient storage

name: Brew All Positive Potions
description: Brew every positive effect potion at least once
tips: Includes Healing, Regeneration, Strength, Swiftness, Fire Resistance, Water Breathing, Night Vision, Invisibility, Slow Falling, and Leaping

name: Brew All Negative Potions
description: Brew every negative effect potion at least once
tips: Includes Poison, Harming, Weakness, Slowness, and Turtle Master

name: Dragon's Breath Collection
description: Collect Dragon's Breath from the Ender Dragon
tips: Use empty glass bottles on dragon breath clouds during the fight
